 28821                                  	;retn
 28822                                  	; 18/12/2022
 28823 00004A34 E97401                  	jmp	DEVNAME
 28824                                  
 28825                                  ;Break	<ROOTPATH, FINDPATH -- PARSE A PATH>
 28826                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28827                                  ;
 28828                                  ; Procedure Name : ROOTPATH,FINDPATH
 28829                                  ;
 28830                                  ; Inputs:
 28831                                  ;	Same as FINDPATH but,
 28832                                  ;	SI Points to asciz string of path which is assumed to start at
 28833                                  ;		the root (no leading '/').
 28834                                  ; Function:
 28835                                  ;	Search from root for path
 28836                                  ; Outputs:
 28837                                  ;	Same as FINDPATH but:
 28838                                  ;	If root directory specified, [CURBUF] and [NAME1] are NOT set, and
 28839                                  ;	[NoSetDir] is ignored.
 28840                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28841                                  
 28842                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28843                                  	; DOSCODE:7F47h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 28844                                  
 28845                                  	; 15/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 28846                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:8C9Dh
 28847                                  
 28848                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:7F82h)
 28849                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:829Eh)
 28850                                  
 28851                                  ROOTPATH:
 28852 00004A37 E8B8FD                  	call	SETROOTSRCH
 28853                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28854 00004A3A 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah
 28855                                  	;CMP	BYTE [SI],0
 28856 00004A3C 3824                    	cmp	[si],ah ; 0
 28857 00004A3E 7507                    	JNZ	short FINDPATH
 28858                                  
 28859                                  	;;;
 28860                                  	;; 15/02/2024
 28861                                  	; Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:82A6h
 28862                                  	;mov	word [CURBUF],0FFFFh
 28863                                  	;;;
 28864                                  
 28865                                  ; Root dir specified
 28866 00004A40 A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 28867 00004A43 A2[6B05]                	MOV	[ATTRIB],AL
 28868                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28869                                  	;XOR	AH,AH			; Sets "device ID" byte, sets zero
 28870                                  					; (dir), clears carry.
 28871 00004A46 C3                      	retn
 28872                                  
 28873                                  ; Inputs:
 28874                                  ;	[ATTRIB] Set to get through directories
 28875                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Set to find last element
 28876                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 28877                                  ;	SI Points to asciz string of path (no leading '/').
 28878                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] = 0
 28879                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = Phys sec # of first sector of directory
 28880                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Cluster # of next cluster
 28881                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors per cluster
 28882                                  ;	[NoSetDir] set
 28883                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 28884                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 28885                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 28886                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 28887                                  ;	[CREATING] and [DELALL] set
 28888                                  ; Function:
 28889                                  ;	Parse path name
 28890                                  ; Outputs:
 28891                                  ;	ID1 field of [THISCDS] updated appropriately
 28892                                  ;	[ATTRIB] = [SATTRIB]
 28893                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 28894                                  ;	[THISDPB] = ES:BP
 28895                                  ;	Carry set if bad path
 28896                                  ;	   SI Points to path element causing failure
 28897                                  ;	   Zero set
 28898                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC] are set up to
 28899                                  ;	      start a search on the last directory
 28900                                  ;	      CL is zero if there is a bad name in the path
 28901                                  ;	      CL is non-zero if the name was simply not found
 28902                                  ;		 [ENTFREE] may have free spot in directory
 28903                                  ;		 [NAME1] is the name.
 28904                                  ;		 CL = 81H if '*'s or '?' in NAME1, 80H otherwise
 28905                                  ;	   Zero reset
 28906                                  ;	      File in middle of path or bad name in path
 28907                                  ;		or path too long or malformed path
 28908                                  ;	ELSE
 28909                                  ;	   [CURBUF] contains directory record with match
 28910                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:BX Points into [CURBUF] to start of entry
 28911                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to fcb_FIRCLUS field for entry
 28912                                  ;	   [NAME1] Has name looked for
 28913                                  ;	   AH = device ID
 28914                                  ;	      bit 7 of AH set if device SI and BX
 28915                                  ;	      will point DOSGROUP relative The firclus
 28916                                  ;	      field of the device entry contains the device pointer
 28917                                  ;	   If last element is a directory zero is set and:
 28918                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC]
 28919                                  ;	      are set up to start a search on it,
 28920                                  ;	      unless [NoSetDir] is non zero in which case the return is
 28921                                  ;	      like that for a file (except for zero flag)
 28922                                  ;	   If last element is a file zero is reset
 28923                                  ;	      [DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],
 28924                                  ;	      [LASTENT], [ENTLAST] are set to continue search of last
 28925                                  ;	      directory for furthur matches on NAME1 via the NEXTENT
 28926                                  ;	      entry point in FindEntry (or GETENT entry in GETENTRY in
 28927                                  ;	      which case [NXTCLUSNUM] and [SECCLUSPOS] need not be valid)
 28928                                  ; Destroys all other registers
 28929                                  
 28930                                  	; 11/05/2025 (MiniDOS v1.0)
 28931                                  
 28932                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28933                                  	; DOSCODE:7F58h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 28934                                  
 28935                                  	; 15/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 28936                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:8CAEh
 28937                                  
 28938                                      	;entry	FINDPATH
 28939                                  FINDPATH:
 28940 00004A47 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 28941 00004A48 56                      	PUSH	SI
 28942 00004A49 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 28943 00004A4B 8B0E[C205]              	MOV	CX,[DIRSTART]		; Get start clus of dir being searched
 28944 00004A4F 833E[B605]FF            	CMP	word [CURR_DIR_END],-1
 28945 00004A54 7415                    	JZ	short NOIDS		; No current dir part
 28946 00004A56 3B3E[B605]              	CMP	DI,[CURR_DIR_END]
 28947 00004A5A 750F                    	JNZ	short NOIDS		; Not to current dir end yet
 28948 00004A5C C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 28949                                  	;;;
 28950                                  	; 15/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 28951 00004A60 A1[DC0A]                	mov	ax,[DIRSTART_HW]
 28952                                  	;mov	[es:di+4Bh],ax
 28953 00004A63 2689454B                	mov	[es:di+curdir.ID+2],ax
 28954                                  	;;;
 28955                                  	;mov	[es:di+73],cx
 28956 00004A67 26894D49                	MOV	[ES:DI+curdir.ID],CX	; Set current directory cluster
 28957                                  NOIDS:
 28958                                  
 28959                                  ; Parse the name off of DS:SI into NAME1. AL = 1 if there was a meta
 28960                                  ; character in the string. CX,DI may be destroyed.
 28961                                  ;
 28962                                  ;	invoke	NAMETRANS
 28963                                  ;	MOV	CL,AL
 28964                                  ;
 28965                                  ; The above is the slow method. The name has *already* been munged by
 28966                                  ; TransPath so no special casing needs to be done. All we do is try to copy
 28967                                  ; the name until ., \ or 0 is hit.
 28968                                  
 28969                                  	;MOV	AX,SS
 28970                                  	;MOV	ES,AX
 28971                                  	; 15/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 28972 00004A6B 16                      	push	ss
 28973 00004A6C 07                      	pop	es
 28974                                  
 28975                                  ;hkn; Name1 is in DOSDATA
 28976 00004A6D BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 28977                                  	;MOV	AX,'  ' ; 2020h
 28978                                  	;STOSB
 28979                                  	;STOSW
 28980                                  	;STOSW
 28981                                  	;STOSW
 28982                                  	;STOSW
 28983                                  	;STOSW
 28984                                  	; 11/05/2025 (MiniDOS)
 28985 00004A70 B020                    	mov	al, ' ' ; 20h
 28986 00004A72 B90B00                  	mov	cx, 11
 28987 00004A75 F3AA                    	rep	stosb
 28988                                  
 28989                                  ;hkn; Name1 is in DOSDATA
 28990 00004A77 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 28991                                  	; 11/05/2025
 28992                                  	;XOR	AH,AH			; bits for CL
 28993                                  GetNam:
 28994                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28995                                  	;INC	CL ; ?*! ; MSDOS 6.0	;AN000; KK increment volid count
 28996                                  
 28997                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28998                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28999                                  	;inc	cl ; not required !
 29000                                  	
 29001 00004A7A AC                      	LODSB
 29002 00004A7B 3C2E                    	CMP	AL,'.'	; 2Eh
 29003 00004A7D 7412                    	JZ	short _SetExt
 29004 00004A7F 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 29005 00004A81 7424                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 29006 00004A83 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'	; 5Ch
 29007 00004A85 7420                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 29008 00004A87 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,'?'	; 3Fh
 29009 00004A89 7503                    	JNZ	short StoNam
 29010                                  	;OR	AH,1
 29011                                  	; 11/05/2025
 29012 00004A8B 80C901                  	or	cl, 1
 29013                                  StoNam: 
 29014 00004A8E AA                      	STOSB
 29015 00004A8F EBE9                    	JMP	short GetNam
 29016                                  _SetExt:
 29017 00004A91 BF[5305]                	MOV	DI,NAME1+8
 29018                                  GetExt:
 29019 00004A94 AC                      	LODSB
 29020 00004A95 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 29021 00004A97 740E                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 29022 00004A99 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'
 29023 00004A9B 740A                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 29024 00004A9D 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,'?'
 29025 00004A9F 7503                    	JNZ	short StoExt
 29026                                  	;OR	AH,1
 29027                                  	; 11/05/2025
 29028 00004AA1 80C901                  	or	cl, 1
 29029                                  StoExt: 
 29030 00004AA4 AA                      	STOSB
 29031 00004AA5 EBED                    	JMP	short GetExt
 29032                                  _GetDone:
 29033 00004AA7 4E                      	DEC	SI
 29034                                  	; 11/05/2025
 29035                                  	;MOV	CL,AH  ; 0 or 1 ; 29/12/2022
 29036 00004AA8 80C980                  	OR	CL,80H
 29037 00004AAB 5F                      	POP	DI			; Start of this element
 29038 00004AAC 07                      	POP	ES			; Restore ES:BP
 29039 00004AAD 39FE                    	CMP	SI,DI
 29040 00004AAF 7503                    	JNZ	short check_device
 29041 00004AB1 E9B700                  	JMP	_BADPATH		; NUL parse (two delims most likely)
 29042                                  check_device:
 29043 00004AB4 56                      	PUSH	SI			; Start of next element
 29044                                  	;MOV	AL,[SI]
 29045                                  	; 15/02/2024
 29046 00004AB5 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 29047                                  	; 23/09/2023
 29048                                  	;cmp	byte [si],0
 29049 00004AB7 7508                    	JNZ	short NOT_LAST
 29050                                  
 29051                                  ; for last element of the path switch to the correct search attributes
 29052                                  
 29053 00004AB9 8A3E[6D05]              	MOV	BH,[SATTRIB]
 29054 00004ABD 883E[6B05]              	MOV	[ATTRIB],BH

 29318                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 29320                                  ; Procedure Name : STARTSRCH
 29321                                  ;
 29322                                  ; Inputs:
 29323                                  ;	[THISDPB] Set
 29324                                  ; Function:

 29327                                  ;	ES:BP = Drive parameters

 29342                                  ;BREAK <MatchAttributes - the final check for attribute matching>
 29343                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29344                                  ; Procedure Name : MatchAttributes

 29346                                  ; Input:    [Attrib] = attribute to search for

 29348                                  ; Output:   JZ <match>

 29360                                  	;and	al,16h

 29362                                  ;
 29363                                  ; the result is non-zero if an attribute is not in the search set
 29364                                  ; and in the found set and in the important set. This means that we do not
 29365                                  ; have a match. Do a JNZ <nomatch> or JZ <match>
 29366                                  ;

 29382                                  ;Break <DevName - Look for name of device>

 29387                                  ; Inputs:

 29391                                  ; Function:
 29392                                  ;	Determine if file is in list of I/O drivers
 29393                                  ; Outputs:
 29394                                  ;	Carry set if not a device
 29395                                  ;	ELSE

 29474                                  ;BREAK <Build_device_ent - Make a Directory entry>
 29475                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29476                                  ; Procedure Name : Build_device_ent
 29477                                  ;
 29478                                  ; Inputs:
 29479                                  ;	[NAME1] has name
 29480                                  ;	BH is attribute field (supplied by DEVNAME)
 29481                                  ;	[DEVPT] points to device header (supplied by DEVNAME)
 29482                                  ; Function:
 29483                                  ;	Build a directory entry for a device at DEVFCB
 29484                                  ; Outputs:

 29748                                  
 29749                                  ;Break	<CheckThisDevice - Check for being a device>
 29750                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29751                                  ;
 29752                                  ;   CheckThisDevice - Examine the area at DS:SI to see if there is a valid
 29753                                  ;   device specified. We will return carry if there is a device present. 
 29754                                  ;   The forms of devices we will recognize are:
 29755                                  ;
 29756                                  ;	[path]device
 29757                                  ;
 29758                                  ;   Note that the drive letter has *already* been removed. All other forms
 29759                                  ;   are not considered to be devices. If such a device is found we change
 29760                                  ;   the source pointer to point to the device component.
 29761                                  ;
 29762                                  ;   Inputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 29763                                  ;		DS:SI contains name
 29764                                  ;   Outputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 29765                                  ;		DS:SI point to name or device
 29766                                  ;		Carry flag set if device was found
 29767                                  ;		Carry flag reset otherwise
 29768                                  ;   Registers Modified: all except ES:DI, DS
 29769                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29770                                  
 29771                                  CheckThisDevice:
 29772 00004D04 57                      	push	di
 29773 00004D05 56                      	push	si
 29774 00004D06 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 29775                                  
 29776                                  ; Check for presence of \dev\ (Dam multiplan!)
 29777                                  
 29778 00004D08 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 29779 00004D0A E8330D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; is it a path char?
 29780 00004D0D 7517                    	JNZ	short ParseDev		; no, go attempt to parse device
 29781 00004D0F 46                      	INC	SI			; simulate LODSB
 29782                                  
 29783                                  ; We have the leading path separator. Look for DEV part.
 29784                                  
 29785 00004D10 AD                      	LODSW
 29786 00004D11 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020h
 29787 00004D14 3D6465                  	cmp	ax,"de"
 29788                                  	;CMP	AX,"e"<< 8 + "d"
 29789 00004D17 752D                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; not "de", assume not device
 29790 00004D19 AC                      	LODSB
 29791 00004D1A 0C20                    	OR	AL,20h
 29792 00004D1C 3C76                    	CMP	AL,"v"                  ; Not "v", assume not device
 29793 00004D1E 7526                    	JNZ	short NotDevice
 29794 00004D20 AC                      	LODSB
 29795 00004D21 E81C0D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; do we have the last path separator?
 29796 00004D24 7520                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; no. go for it.
 29797                                  
 29798                                  ; DS:SI now points to a potential drive. Preserve them as NameTrans advances
 29799                                  ; SI and DevName may destroy DS.
 29800                                  
 29801                                  ParseDev:
 29802 00004D26 1E                      	push	ds
 29803 00004D27 56                      	push	si			; preserve the source pointer
 29804 00004D28 E8590C                  	call	NameTrans		; advance DS:SI
 29805 00004D2B 803C00                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0		; parse entire string?
 29806 00004D2E F9                      	STC				; simulate a Carry return from DevName
 29807 00004D2F 750B                    	JNZ	short SkipSearch	; no parse. simulate a file return.
 29808                                  
 29809                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 29810 00004D31 16                      	push	ss
 29811 00004D32 1F                      	pop	ds
 29812                                  
 29813                                  ; M026 - start - fix ported from ROMDOS2 for bug # 2849
 29814                                  ;
 29815                                  ; SR;
 29816                                  ; We have to set Attrib before invoking DevName. Otherwise, the value from
 29817                                  ; a previous DOS call is used and DevName thinks it is not a device if the
 29818                                  ; old call set the volume attribute bit.
 29819                                  
 29820 00004D33 A0[6D05]                	mov	al,[SATTRIB]
 29821 00004D36 A2[6B05]                	mov	[ATTRIB],al		;set Attrib for DevName
 29822                                  
 29823                                  ; M026 - end
 29824                                  
 29825 00004D39 E86FFE                  	call	DEVNAME
 29826                                  
 29827                                  SkipSearch:
 29828 00004D3C 5E                      	pop	si
 29829 00004D3D 1F                      	pop	ds
 29830                                  
 29831                                  ; SI points to the beginning of the potential device. If we have a device
 29832                                  ; then we do not change SI. If we have a file, then we reset SI back to the
 29833                                  ; original value. At this point Carry set indicates FILE.
 29834                                  
 29835                                  CheckReturn:
 29836 00004D3E 5F                      	pop	di			; get original SI
 29837 00004D3F 7302                    	JNC	short Check_Done	; if device then do not reset pointer
 29838 00004D41 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 29839                                  Check_Done:
 29840 00004D43 5F                      	pop	di
 29841 00004D44 F5                      	CMC				; invert carry. Carry => device
 29842 00004D45 C3                      	retn
 29843                                  NotDevice:
 29844 00004D46 F9                      	STC
 29845 00004D47 EBF5                    	JMP	short CheckReturn

 29897                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29898                                  ;
 29899                                  ; Procedure Name : IOFUNC
 29900                                  ;
 29901                                  ; Inputs:
 29902                                  ;	DS:SI Points to SFT
 29903                                  ;	AH is function code
 29904                                  ;		= 0 Input
 29905                                  ;		= 1 Input Status
 29906                                  ;		= 2 Output
 29907                                  ;		= 3 Output Status
 29908                                  ;		= 4 Flush
 29909                                  ;		= 5 Input Status - System WAIT invoked for K09 if no char
 29910                                  ;				   present.
 29911                                  ;	AL = character if output
 29912                                  ; Function:
 29913                                  ;	Perform indicated I/O to device or file
 29914                                  ; Outputs:
 29915                                  ;	AL is character if input
 29916                                  ;	If a status call
 29917                                  ;		zero set if not ready
 29918                                  ;		zero reset if ready (character in AL for input status)
 29919                                  ; For regular files:
 29920                                  ;	Input Status
 29921                                  ;		Gets character but restores position
 29922                                  ;		Zero set on EOF
 29923                                  ;	Input
 29924                                  ;		Gets character advances position
 29925                                  ;		Returns ^Z on EOF
 29926                                  ;	Output Status
 29927                                  ;		Always ready
 29928                                  ; AX altered, all other registers preserved

 30205                                  ;**	Dev_Open_SFT - Open the Device for an SFT
 30206                                  ;
 30207                                  ;	Dev_Open_SFT issues an open call to the device associated with

 30224                                  ;

 30239                                  
 30240                                  	; Main entry for device open and close. AL contains the function 
 30241                                  	; requested. Subtlety: if Sharing is NOT loaded then we do NOT issue 
 30242                                  	; open/close to block devices. This allows networks to function but 
 30243                                  	; does NOT hang up with bogus change-line code.
 30244                                  
 30245                                  	;entry	DO_OPCLS

 30247                                  	; Is the SFT for the net? If so, no action necessary.
 30248                                  
 30249                                  	; MSDOS 6.0

 30261                                  	; We are about to call device open/close on a block driver. If no

 30607                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30608                                  ; DOSCODE:86A8h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30609                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30610                                  ; DOSCODE:866Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30611                                  
 30612                                  ;Break	<RW_SC -- Read Write Secondary Cache>
 30613                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30614                                  ;
 30615                                  ; Procedure Name : RW_SC
 30616                                  ;
 30617                                  ; Inputs:
 30618                                  ;	 [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= secondary cache count
 30619                                  ;	 [SC_STATUS]= SC validity status
 30620                                  ;	 [SEQ_SECTOR]= last sector read
 30621                                  ; Function:
 30622                                  ;	Read from or write through secondary cache
 30623                                  ; Output:
 30624                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 30625                                  ;	carry clear, I/O is not done
 30626                                  ;		     [SC_FLAG]=1 if continuos sectors will be read
 30627                                  ;	carry set, I/O is done
 30628                                  ;
 30629                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30630                                  
 30631                                  RW_SC:
 30632                                  	; SS override for all variables used.
 30633                                  	
 30634                                  	CMP	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0  ;AN000;LB. secondary cache exists?
 30635                                  	JZ	short scexit4		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 30636                                  	CMP	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;LB. sector count = 1 (buffer I/O)
 30637                                  	JNZ	short scexit4 		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 30638                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30639                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;LB. yes
 30640                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;LB. save registers
 30641                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30642                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;LB.
 30643                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30644                                  
 30645                                  	MOV	DX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. starting sector
 30646                                  	CMP	BYTE [ss:DEVCALL_REQFUNC],DEVRD ;AN000;LB. read ?
 30647                                  	JZ	short doread		    ;AN000;LB. yes
 30648                                  	CALL	INVALIDATE_SC		    ;AN000;LB. invalidate SC
 30649                                  	JMP	scexit2 		    ;AN000;LB. back to normal
 30650                                  scexit4:				    ;AN000;
 30651                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. I/O not done yet
 30652                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30653                                  doread: 				    ;AN000;
 30654                                  	CALL	SC2BUF			    ;AN000;LB. check if in SC
 30655                                  	JC	short readSC		    ;AN000;LB.
 30656                                  	MOV	word [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STDON ;AN000;LB. fake done and ok
 30657                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 30658                                  	JMP	short saveseq 		    ;AN000;LB. save seq. sector #
 30659                                  readSC: 				    ;AN000;
 30660                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]   	    ;AN000;LB. subtract sector num from
 30661                                  	MOV	CX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. saved sequential sector
 30662                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR]    	    ;AN000;LB. number
 30663                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2]  	    ;AN000;LB.
 30664                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30665                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;LB. greater than 64K
 30666                                  	JNZ	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. yes,save seq. sector #
 30667                                  chklow: 						
 30668                                  	CMP	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. <= 1
 30669                                  	JA	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. no, not sequential
 30670                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],-1	    ;AN000;LB. presume all SC valid
 30671                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;LB. yes, sequential
 30672                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLSCNT],AX	    ;AN000;LB. read continuous sectors
 30673                                  readsr:
 30674                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD+2]	    ;AN000;LB. save buffer addr
 30675                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. in temp vars
 30676                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD]	    	    ;AN000;LB.
 30677                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30678                                  
 30679                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. use SC cache addr as
 30680                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;LB. transfer addr
 30681                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30682                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30683                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],1	    ;AN000;LB. flag it for later;
 30684                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;LB. current drive
 30685                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_DRIVE],AL	    ;AN000;LB. set current drive
 30686                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. current sector
 30687                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR],AX	    ;AN000;LB. set current sector
 30688                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30689                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30690                                  saveseq2:				    ;AN000;
 30691                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 30692                                  saveseq:				    ;AN000;	
 30693                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB. save current sector #
 30694                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. for access mode ref.
 30695                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB.	
 30696                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR],AX 	    ;AN000;LB.	
 30697                                  	JMP	short scexit 		    ;AN000;LB.	
 30698                                  scexit2:				    ;AN000;LB.
 30699                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB.	clear carry
 30700                                  scexit: 				    ;AN000;		
 30701                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30702                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;LB. restore registers
 30703                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 30704                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;LB.
 30705                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30706                                  	POP	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30707                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30708                                  
 30709                                  ;Break	<IN_SC -- check if in secondary cache>
 30710                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30711                                  ;
 30712                                  ; Procedure Name : IN_SC
 30713                                  ;
 30714                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 30715                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 30716                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 30717                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 30718                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 30719                                  ; Function:
 30720                                  ;	Check if the sector is in secondary cache
 30721                                  ; Output:
 30722                                  ;	carry clear, in SC
 30723                                  ;	   CX= the index in the secondary cache
 30724                                  ;	carry set, not in SC
 30725                                  ;
 30726                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30727                                  
 30728                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30729                                  IN_SC:
 30730                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30731                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. current drive
 30732                                  	CMP	AL,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. same as SC drive
 30733                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30734                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;;LB. subtract sector num from
 30735                                  	MOV	CX,DX			    ;AN000;;LB. secondary starting sector
 30736                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]        ;AN000;;LB. number
 30737                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]      ;AN000;;LB.
 30738                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30739                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;;LB. greater than 64K
 30740                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30741                                  	CMP	CX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;;LB. greater than SC count
 30742                                  	JAE	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30743                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. clear carry
 30744                                  	;JMP	short inexit		    ;AN000;;LB. in SC
 30745                                  	; 16/12/2022
 30746                                  	retn	; 30/04/2019
 30747                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 30748                                  	;jmp	short inexit
 30749                                  
 30750                                  outrange2:				    ;AN000;;LB. set carry
 30751                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30752                                  inexit: 				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30753                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30754                                  
 30755                                  ;Break	<INVALIDATE_SC - invalide secondary cache>
 30756                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30757                                  ;
 30758                                  ; Procedure Name : Invalidate_Sc
 30759                                  ;
 30760                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 30761                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 30762                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 30763                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 30764                                  ;	   [SC_STATUS]= SC status word
 30765                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 30766                                  ;
 30767                                  ; Function:
 30768                                  ;	invalidate secondary cache if in there
 30769                                  ; Output:
 30770                                  ;	[SC_STATUS] is updated
 30771                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30772                                  
 30773                                  INVALIDATE_SC:
 30774                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30775                                  
 30776                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;;LB. in secondary cache
 30777                                  	JC	short outrange		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30778                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate the sector
 30779                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;;LB. in the secondary cache
 30780                                  	NOT	AX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30781                                  	AND	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;;LB. save the status
 30782                                  outrange:				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30783                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.

 30785                                  ; DOSCODE:87A5h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30786                                  ; 22/11/2022
 30787                                  ; DOSCODE:876Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30788                                  
 30789                                  ;Break	<VIRREAD- virtually read data into buffer>
 30790                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30791                                  ;
 30792                                  ; Procedure Name : SC_FLAG
 30793                                  ;
 30794                                  ; Inputs:  SC_FLAG = 0, no sectors were read into SC
 30795                                  ;		     1, continuous sectors were read into SC
 30796                                  ; Function:
 30797                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30798                                  ; Output:
 30799                                  ;	 carry clear, data is moved to buffer
 30800                                  ;	 carry set, bad sector or exceeds maximum sector
 30801                                  ;	   SC_FLAG =0
 30802                                  ;	   CALLSCNT=1
 30803                                  ;	   SC_STATUS= -1 if succeeded
 30804                                  ;     
 30805                                  ;		       0 if failed
 30806                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30807                                  
 30808                                  VIRREAD:
 30809                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30810                                  
 30811                                  	CMP	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. from SC fill
 30812                                  	JZ	short sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 30813                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]	    ;AN000;;LB. restore buffer addr
 30814                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;;LB.
 30815                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR]	    ;AN000;;LB.
 30816                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;;LB.
 30817                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sc_flag
 30818                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. one sector transferred
 30819                                  
 30820                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STERR ;AN000;;LB. error?
 30821                                  	test	byte [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT+1],(STERR>>8) ; 80h
 30822                                  	JNZ	short scerror 		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 30823                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30824                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30825                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30826                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30827                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30828                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30829                                  	XOR	CX,CX			    ;AN000;;LB. we want first sector in SC
 30830                                  	CALL	SC2BUF2 		    ;AN000;;LB. move data from SC to buf
 30831                                  	POP	CX
 30832                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30833                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30834                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30835                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30836                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 30837                                  	JMP	SHORT sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. return
 30838                                  scerror:				    ;AN000;
 30839                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sector count to 1
 30840                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate all SC sectors
 30841                                  	MOV	byte [ss:CurSC_DRIVE],-1    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate drive
 30842                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry set
 30843                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30844                                  sc2end: 				    ;AN000;
 30845                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry clear
 30846                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 30847                                  
 30848                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro  DOS v4.0
 30849                                  ; DOSCODE:87FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30850                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30851                                  ; DOSCODE:87C2h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30852                                  
 30853                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>
 30854                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30855                                  ;
 30856                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 30857                                  ;
 30858                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 30859                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 30860                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 30861                                  ; Function:
 30862                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 30863                                  ; Output:
 30864                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved
 30865                                  ;	   carry set, not in SC and data is not moved
 30866                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30867                                  
 30868                                  SC2BUF:
 30869                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 30870                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;LB. in secondary cache
 30871                                  	;JC	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30872                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30873                                  	jc	short sexit
 30874                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;LB. check if valid sector
 30875                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 30876                                  	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 30877                                  	JZ	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. invalid
 30878                                  ;entry SC2BUF2
 30879                                  SC2BUF2:				    ;AN000;
 30880                                  	;MOV	AX,CX			    ;AN000;LB. times index with
 30881                                  	;MUL	word [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]    ;AN000;LB. sector size
 30882                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30883                                  	mov	ax,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30884                                  	xchg	ax,cx ; cx = [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 30885                                  	mul	cx
 30886                                  	ADD	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. add SC starting addr
 30887                                  	ADC	DX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 30888                                  	MOV	DS,DX			    ;AN000;LB. DS:SI-> SC sector addr
 30889                                  	MOV	SI,AX			    ;AN000;LB.
 30890                                  	MOV	ES,[ss:CALLXAD+2]		    ;AN000;LB. ES:DI-> buffer addr
 30891                                  	MOV	DI,[ss:CALLXAD]		    ;AN000;LB.
 30892                                  	; 24/09/2023
 30893                                  	;MOV	CX,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]	    ;AN000;LB. count= sector size
 30894                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. may use DWORD move for 386
 30895                                  ;entry MOVWORDS
 30896                                  MOVWORDS:				    ;AN000;
 30897                                  	CMP	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0	    ;AN000;LB. 386 ?
 30898                                  	JZ	short nodd		    ;AN000;LB. no
 30899                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. words/2
 30900                                  	DB	66H			    ;AN000;LB. use double word move
 30901                                  nodd:
 30902                                  	REP	MOVSW			    ;AN000;LB. move to buffer
 30903                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 30904                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB. exit
 30905                                  noSC:					    ;AN000;
 30906                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 30907                                  sexit:					    ;AN000;
 30908                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 30909                                  
 30910                                  %endif	; SC

 30920                                  ;	NAME	MKNODE
 30921                                  
 30922                                  ;**	MKNODE.ASM
 30923                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30924                                  ;	Low level routines for making a new local file system node
 30925                                  ;	and filling in an SFT from a directory entry
 30926                                  ;
 30927                                  ;	BUILDDIR
 30928                                  ;	SETDOTENT

 30930                                  ;	NEWENTRY
 30931                                  ;	FREEENT
 30932                                  ;	NEWDIR

 30935                                  ;	CHECK_VIRT_OPEN

 30938                                  ;
 30939                                  ;	 AN000	version 4.0  Jan. 1988

 30941                                  
 30942                                  ;Break   <BUILDDIR,NEWDIR -- ALLOCATE DIRECTORIES>
 30943                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30944                                  ;
 30945                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 30946                                  ;
 30947                                  ; Inputs:
 30948                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 30949                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 30950                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 30951                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 30952                                  ;               entries
 30953                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 30954                                  ; Function:
 30955                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 30956                                  ; Outputs:
 30957                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 30958                                  ;       ELSE
 30959                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 30960                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 30961                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 30962                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]
 30963                                  ;
 30964                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30965                                  
 30966                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30967                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30968                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30969                                  ; DOSCODE:880Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 30970                                  
 30971                                  ; 24/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS)
 30972                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.22, MSDOS.SYS)
 30973

 31065                                  	;;;
 31066 00005060 5B                      	POP	BX
 31067 00005061 720C                    	JB	short NOTFIRSTGROW
 31068                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 31069 00005063 891E[BC05]              	MOV	[CLUSNUM],BX

 31072                                  %if 0

 31103                                  NOTFIRSTGROW:

 31113 0000507B 30ED                    	XOR	CH,CH
 31114                                  ZERODIR:

 31120                                  	;call	GETBUFFR
 31121 00005080 E8FE14                  	call	GETBUFFRD ; *
 31122 00005083 7302                    	JNC	short GET_SSIZE
 31123 00005085 59                      	POP	CX
 31124 00005086 C3                      	retn
 31125

 31127                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]

 31129 0000508B 06                      	PUSH    ES
 31130 0000508C C43E[E205]              	LES	DI,[CURBUF]
 31131                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],4
 31132 00005090 26804D0504              	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDIR
 31133 00005095 57                      	PUSH    DI
 31134                                  	;;;add	di,16	; MSDOS 3.3

 31138 00005099 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 31139 0000509B D1E9                    	SHR	CX,1
 31140 0000509D F3AB                    	REP	STOSW

 31142 000050A1 AA                      	STOSB
 31143                                  EVENZ:

 31145

 31150                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;

 31152                                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB. 				  ;AN000;
 31153

 31155                                  	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 31156                                  %else

 31158 000050A3 E86E17                  	call	SET_BUF_DIRTY
 31159                                  %endif
 31160                                  
 31161                                  yesdirty7:
 31162 000050A6 07                      	POP	ES
 31163 000050A7 59                      	POP	CX
 31164

 31166

 31169

 31171                                  	; 24/09/2023

 31173                                  	;;adc	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0
 31174                                  	;; 24/09/2023
 31175                                  	;; ax=0
 31176                                  	;adc	[HIGH_SECTOR],ax ; 0
 31177                                  	; 24/09/2023

 31179 000050A9 7504                    	jnz	short loop_zerodir
 31180 000050AB FF06[0706]              	inc	word [HIGH_SECTOR]
 31181                                  loop_zerodir:

 31185 000050B4 40                      	INC	AX
 31186                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31187                                  	; cf=0
 31188                                  	;CLC
 31189 000050B5 C3                      	retn
 31190                                  
 31191                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31192                                  ;
 31193                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 31194                                  ;
 31195                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 31196                                  ;
 31197                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 31198                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."
 31199                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry
 31200                                  ;
 31201                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31202                                  
 31203                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31204                                  
 31205                                  SETDOTENT:
 31206                                  ;	Fill in name field
 31207 000050B6 AB                      	STOSW
 31208 000050B7 B90400                  	MOV	CX,4
 31209 000050BA B82020                  	MOV	AX,"  " ; 2020h
 31210 000050BD F3AB                    	REP	STOSW
 31211 000050BF AA                      	STOSB
 31212                                  
 31213                                  ;	Set up attribute
 31214                                  	;mov	al, 10h
 31215 000050C0 B010                    	MOV	AL,attr_directory
 31216 000050C2 AA                      	STOSB
 31217                                  
 31218                                  ;	Initialize time and date of creation
 31219                                  	;ADD	DI,10
 31220                                  	; 23/04/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31221                                  	;;;
 31222 000050C3 83C708                  	add	di,8
 31223 000050C6 A1[F20A]                	mov	ax,[CLUSTERS_HW]
 31224 000050C9 AB                      	stosw		; Set up first cluster field (hw)
 31225                                  	;;;	
 31226 000050CA 8B36[9E05]              	MOV	SI,[THISSFT]
 31227                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Dh]
 31228 000050CE 8B440D                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time]
 31229 000050D1 AB                      	STOSW
 31230                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Fh]
 31231 000050D2 8B440F                  	MOV	AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date]
 31232 000050D5 AB                      	STOSW
 31233                                  
 31234                                  ;	Set up first cluster field (lw)
 31235 000050D6 89D0                    	MOV	AX,DX
 31236 000050D8 AB                      	STOSW
 31237                                  
 31238                                  ;	0 file size
 31239                                  	;XOR	AX,AX
 31240 000050D9 91                      	xchg	ax,cx ; 23/02/2024
 31241 000050DA AB                      	STOSW
 31242 000050DB AB                      	STOSW
 31243 000050DC C3                      	retn
 31244                                  
 31245                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 31246                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31247                                  ;
 31248                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 31249                                  ;
 31250                                  ; Inputs:
 31251                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 31252                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 31253                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 31254                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 31255                                  ;
 31256                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 31257                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 31258                                  ;
 31259                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 31260                                  ;               terminated)
 31261                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 31262                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 31263                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 31264                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 31265                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 31266                                  ; Function:
 31267                                  ;       Make a new node
 31268                                  ; Outputs:
 31269                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 31270                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 31271                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 31272                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 31273                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 31274                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 31275                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 31276                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 31277                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 31278                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 31279                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 31280                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 31281                                  ;       ELSE
 31282                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 31283                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 31284                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 31285                                  ;               containing new node.
 31286                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 31287                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 31288                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 31289                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 31290                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 31291                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 31292                                  ;
 31293                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31294                                  
 31295                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31296                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31297                                  
 31298                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31299                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31300                                  
 31301                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31302                                  ; DOSCODE:951Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31303                                  
 31304                                  MakeNode:
 31305                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 31306 000050DD C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 31307 000050E3 50                      	PUSH	AX 		; Save AH value
 31308 000050E4 C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 31309 000050E9 A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 31310 000050EC E891F8                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 31311 000050EF 88CA                    	MOV	DL,CL		; Save CL info
 31312                                  	;MOV	CX,AX		; Device ID to CH
 31313                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31314 000050F1 91                      	xchg	ax,cx
 31315 000050F2 58                      	POP	AX		; Get back AH
 31316 000050F3 732D                    	JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 31317 000050F5 7505                    	JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 31318 000050F7 80FA80                  	CMP	DL,80h		; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 31319 000050FA 7405                    	JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 31320                                  make_err_4:
 31321 000050FC B004                    	MOV	AL,4		; case 1 bad path
 31322                                  make_err_ret:
 31323                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31324                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31325 000050FE 98                      	cbw
 31326 000050FF F9                      	STC
 31327                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 31328 00005100 C3                      	retn
 31329                                  
 31330                                  	;entry	RENAME_MAKE	; Used by DOS_RENAME to "copy" a node
 31331                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 31332                                  make_type:
 31333                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 31334                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 31335                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 31336 00005101 F606[F605]01            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ; 1
 31337 00005106 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31338 00005108 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 31339                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 31340                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 31341 0000510D F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 31342 00005112 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 31343 00005114 F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 31344 00005115 B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 31345                                  	; 22/11/2022
 31346                                  make_retn:
 31347                                  	;return
 31348 00005118 C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 31349                                  
 31350                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 31351                                  
 31352                                  make_type2:
 31353 00005119 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 31354 0000511D 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX		; nothing exists Disk Node
 31355 0000511F F9                      	STC			; Not found
 31356 00005120 EB59                    	JMP	short make_new
 31357                                  
 31358                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 31359                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 31360                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 31361                                  ;   else => file
 31362                                  
 31363                                  make_exists:
 31364 00005122 7447                    	JZ	short make_exists_dir
 31365 00005124 B003                    	MOV	AL,3		; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 31366                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 31367 00005126 F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 31368 0000512B 753A                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 31369                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 31370                                  				;  if making DIR or Volume ID
 31371 0000512D 08ED                    	OR	CH,CH
 31372 0000512F 781A                    	JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 31373 00005131 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 31374 00005133 75C9                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 31375 00005135 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save device ID
 31376 00005136 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]
 31377                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 31378 0000513A 268A6F0B                	MOV	CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 31379                                  	;test	ch,1
 31380 0000513E F6C501                  	test	CH,attr_read_only
 31381 00005141 7523                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5P ; Cannot create on read only files
 31382 00005143 E858FA                  	call	MatchAttributes
 31383 00005146 59                      	POP	CX		; Devid back in CH
 31384 00005147 751E                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5 ; Attributes not ok
 31385 00005149 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL		; AL = 0, Disk Node
 31386                                  make_share:
 31387                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 31388                                  	; 23/02/2024
 31389 0000514B 98                      	cbw
 31390 0000514C 50                      	PUSH	AX		; Save Disk or Device node
 31391 0000514D 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save Device ID
 31392 0000514E 88EC                    	MOV	AH,CH		; Device ID to AH

 31448                                  ; We get here by having the user FAIL a share problem. Typically a failure of

 31451

 31476                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)

 31480 000051A9 58                      	POP	AX
 31481 000051AA EBB6                    	jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 31482                                  
 31483                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 31484                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 31485                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 31486                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 31487                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 31488                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 31489                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 31490                                  ;
 31491                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 31492                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 31493                                  
 31494                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31495                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31496                                  
 31497                                  MakeEndShare:

 31499 000051B0 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX

 31504 000051B9 57                      	push	di
 31505 000051BA 06                      	push	es

 31508 000051BF 9D                      	POPF

 31510 000051C1 5F                      	pop	di

 31512                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 31513 000051C5 E8FDC6                  	call	LCritSFT

 31515                                  	; DOSCODE:89E4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31516 000051C8 5B                      	pop	bx
 31517 000051C9 5E                      	pop	si
 31518 000051CA 59                      	pop	cx
 31519 000051CB 58                      	pop	ax
 31520 000051CC E8A0FF                  	CALL	make_save

 31522                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 31523                                  
 31524 000051CF 72A9                    	jc	short make_save_retn	; bye if error

 31526 000051D2 53                      	push	bx

 31540                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31541                                  ;
 31542                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 31543                                  ;
 31544                                  ; Inputs:
 31545                                  ;	  [THISSFT] set
 31546                                  ;	  [THISDPB] set
 31547                                  ;	  [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 31548                                  ;		  entries
 31549                                  ;	  [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 31550                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 31551                                  ;	  [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 31552                                  ;	  CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 31553                                  ;		  NC means file existed (device)
 31554                                  ;		  C  means file did not exist
 31555                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 31556                                  ;	  If FILE
 31557                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31558                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31559                                  ;	  If device
 31560                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31561                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31562                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31563                                  ; Function:
 31564                                  ;	  Make a new directory entry
 31565                                  ;	  If an old one existed it is truncated first
 31566                                  ; Outputs:
 31567                                  ;	  Carry set if error
 31568                                  ;		  Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 31569                                  ;		  vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 31570                                  ;	  else
 31571                                  ;		  outputs of DOOPEN
 31572                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 31573                                  ;
 31574                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31575                                  
 31576                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31577                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31578                                  
 31579                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31580                                  	; DOSCODE:961Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 31581                                  
 31582                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8A34h)
 31583                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8B7Dh)
 31584

 31727                                  ; DOOPEN
 31728                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31729                                  ;
 31730                                  ; Inputs:
 31731                                  ;	  [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 31732                                  ;	  [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 31733                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 31734                                  ;	  If FILE
 31735                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 31736                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 31737                                  ;	  If device
 31738                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 31739                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 31740                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 31741                                  ; Function:
 31742                                  ;	  Fill in SFT from dir entry
 31743                                  ; Outputs:
 31744                                  ;	  CARRY CLEAR
 31745                                  ;	  sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 31746                                  ;	  sf_flags high byte = 0
 31747                                  ;	  sf_flags low byte = AH except
 31748                                  ;	  sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 31749                                  ;	  sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 31750                                  ;	  sf_position = 0
